scripts.db: npm run credsCheck && npm run db:create && npm run db:populateConfigs && npm run db:populateOracle && npm run db:populateArchives
scripts.db:docker: npm run waitForMysql && npm run db:create && npm run db:populateConfigs && npm run db:populateOracle && npm run db:populateArchives
scripts.db:local: npm run credsCheck && npm run db:create && npm run db:fetchCardList && npm run db:populateConfigs && npm run db:populateOracle && npm run db:populateArchives
scripts.db:fetchCardList: npm run db:fetchSetList && curl https://mtgjson.com/api/v5/AtomicCards.json > setup/VintageCards.json && node setup/transformJson.js
